function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Transmission of infectious diseases through contact-based tasks.","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on remote operations for on-site tasks.","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in transmission synchronization","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High network capacity for concurrent communication and data transmission","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of unstructured data from terminal sensors to the cloud platform in real-time","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of high-definition images and videos and huge volume data","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Delay of transmission and information loss in de-spatialized environments, impacting the experience of tele-operation.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited adoption and application of 5g technology due to challenges in network structure and lack of application scenarios.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate research and production of test toolkits for disease detection","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Difficulty in controlling sporadic outbreaks in well-controlled areas","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lagging development of vaccines and medicine","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to prolonged stay-at-home orders and quarantine measures","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on non-communicable diseases ncds due to decreased physical activity during lockdown","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the impact of built environment on mental health","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited evidence and diverse research findings","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in healthcare and working facilities","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mental health impact assessment","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of poor indoor quality including natural lighting, acoustic comfort, thermo-hygrometric comfort, and privacy during phone calls","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of high depressive symptoms among students","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association between architectural parameters and depressive symptoms","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases propagation due to a large number of students in a shared environment.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor housing conditions contributing to moderate-severe and severe depressive symptoms in students","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential impact of built environment on physical and mental health of individuals and community","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor housing quality and inadequate indoor facilities are related to depressive symptoms.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of natural lighting, acoustic comfort, and privacy in living quarters is associated with severe depressive symptoms.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor-quality views from the apartment are linked to moderate-severe and severe depressive symptoms.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor housing physical conditions may impact physical health and contribute to health inequalities during long-term stay-at-home periods.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations of cross-sectional study design in determining temporal relationships between variables","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of larger and more livable living spaces facing green areas","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research on using buildings to prevent epidemics and viruses","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate management of individual behaviors to comply with safety requirements","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited innovation in the built environment to mitigate epidemic spread","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changing building materials may not effectively trap the virus and stop the spread of covid-19","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific knowledge about the effects of covid-19 on building configurations and designs","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in creating sustainable and energy-efficient building designs that minimize the negative impact on communities and the environment","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infection propagation due to inadequate architectural design","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of inadequate infection control in healthcare facilities","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adaptability in healthcare facility design","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor hospital architecture facilitating disease spread","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of integration of infection prevention in sustainable designs","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate adaptation to emerging problems and urgent demands","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate hospital design and adaptability to emerging problems may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases like covid-19","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate indoor environmental quality iaq in built environments can raise human exposure to viral infections such as indoor air quality iaq impacting health","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of flexibility in hospital design","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate architectural design leading to the spread of contagious diseases within buildings.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of risk management and control measures for capturing harmful pathogens such as covid-19 in buildings.","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low medical-knowledge levels in early hospitals","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Low"}]}
